summary.description:
Discover a life shaped by water, nature, and quiet luxury at Purva Sparkling Springs ? The Sound of Water.
This exclusive villa enclave is thoughtfully designed around Bangalore?s largest man-made waterfall, where flowing water features, lush landscapes, and a serene Buddha statue create an atmosphere of rare tranquillity. Every element is crafted to slow life down and elevate everyday living.

Designed for discerning homeowners, these luxury villas offer immersive wellness and leisure experiences?from meditative garden walks and pristine water bodies to vibrant yet intimate community spaces. The result is a lifestyle that balances indulgence with inner calm.

Located along Bannerghatta Road, Purva Sparkling Springs enjoys seamless connectivity to major IT hubs, leading educational institutions, and lifestyle destinations. A gated villa community where serenity meets sophistication, it is an ideal choice for those seeking premium 3 BHK villas that offer privacy, nature, and refined living?without compromise
highlights: Exclusive 3 & 4 BHK luxury villas set across 20 acres of lush greenery
Water-inspired master planning creating a calm, resort-like living experience
12,000 sq. ft. grand clubhouse with curated lifestyle spaces
Infinity swimming pool overlooking serene landscapes
State-of-the-art sports & wellness zones for holistic living
Gated community with low-density planning and enhanced privacy
Excellent connectivity to Jigani, NICE Junction & Electronic City

aboutBuilder.name: purva

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Purva Sparkling Springs located?
items: Purva Sparkling Springs is located off Bannerghatta Road, South Bangalore, with excellent connectivity to Jigani, NICE Junction, and Electronic City.

faqs.title: What type of homes are available at Purva Sparkling Springs?
items: Purva Sparkling Springs offers premium 3 & 4 BHK luxury villas, designed for buyers seeking privacy, space, and a nature-centric lifestyle.

faqs.title: How large is the project and what is the land area?
items: The project is spread across approximately 20 acres with expansive landscaped greens, water-inspired features, and low-density planning.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Sparkling Springs unique among villa projects in Bangalore?
items: Key highlights include Bangalore?s largest man-made waterfall, water-themed master planning, tranquil fountains, lush greenery, and a strong focus on wellness and slow living.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Sparkling Springs?
items: Purva Sparkling Springs is developed by Puravankara Limited, a reputed real estate brand with over five decades of experience in premium residential development.

faqs.title: What amenities are available at Purva Sparkling Springs?
items: Residents enjoy a 12,000 sq. ft. clubhouse, infinity pool, sports facilities, wellness zones, landscaped gardens, water bodies, and curated leisure spaces.

faqs.title: Is Purva Sparkling Springs suitable for professionals working in Electronic City?
items: Yes. Its proximity to Electronic City, Jigani Industrial Area, and NICE Road makes it ideal for professionals seeking luxury villa living with manageable commute times.

faqs.title: What is the price range of villas at Purva Sparkling Springs?
items: Luxury villas at Purva Sparkling Springs are priced from ?4.80 Cr onwards*, depending on configuration, plot size, and specifications.

faqs.title: Is Purva Sparkling Springs a good option for end users?
items: Yes. The project is ideal for end users who value privacy, wellness-focused living, spacious villas, and a serene gated community environment.

faqs.title: Is Purva Sparkling Springs a good long-term investment?
items: Yes. Strong fundamentals include large land parcel, limited luxury villa supply in South Bangalore, infrastructure growth along Bannerghatta Road, and strong brand credibility.

faqs.title: Does Purva Sparkling Springs offer good rental potential?
items: Yes. Luxury villas near Electronic City and NICE Road attract senior professionals and business owners, supporting premium rental demand in the long term.

faqs.title: Is Purva Sparkling Springs RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Sparkling Springs is RERA registered, ensuring transparency, regulatory compliance, and buyer protection as per applicable norms.

faqs.title: Are these villas suitable for investors or end users?
items: Both. End users benefit from privacy and wellness-centric living, while investors gain from limited villa inventory and long-term appreciation potential.

faqs.title: How can I book a site visit or get detailed pricing?
items: You can request a guided site visit, get the latest pricing and availability, and receive unbiased assistance through PropYouLike.
